articles.title: 'Dublin declaration' on tackling domestic violence gets majority backing from Council of Europe - The Irish Times
articles.description: At least 32 member states indicate they will adopt joint declaration on Friday, with more expected to come on board
articles.content: A significant step in ramping up European efforts to tackle domestic violence will be taken in Dublin on Friday, as most of the 46 members of the Council of Europe adopt a joint declaration on key is… [+2615 chars]

articles.title: EU gives Ireland two months to halt peat-cutting in conservation areas or face court - The Irish Times
articles.description: European Commission says dialogue with Ireland on bog issue has been ‘long’, having started in 2011
articles.content:
The European Commission has stepped up the pace of its action against Ireland because of the States failure to halt the cutting of peat within Special Areas of Conservation (Sacs).

articles.author: Ben Schoon
articles.title: Pixel 7 shows up on Amazon again, this time confirming pricing in Europe - 9to5Google
articles.description: According to Amazon, the price of Google's Pixel 7 won't change in countries across Europe, which is certainly great news!
articles.content: Google’s Pixel surprises just can’t seem to stay hidden this week. Following a US leak on Amazon, the online retailer has yet again posted the Pixel 7 early, this time confirming the price of the dev… [+1430 chars]
